Blog.post: Its plain lucky for me today because all the questions that been aired by the panel are answerable..... I'm really on top of the world today.... Looking forward for the result of the interview. P/S It doesn't matter whether i got it or not.. (am i sure ?????? )

Today is consider a big day for me. I was appointed as a Committee Member in the Smart Scout 16 Movement. I feel proud because i'm the youngest among the other fellow scouts. Tonight i'm preparing for another big day tomorrow. I'm going for an interview to be appointed as a school prefect. But i have some problem with it..... my 5 year old brother is disturbing me... So i have to go now... See ya again !!!!!!!!
urlLink when you are boring urlLink

This is my first time i create my blog, and my class mate, Khadijah, taught me how to create it. I only look at my sister blog so I had talked to myself that one day I will create my own blog..so everybody can know me...more...... HavE Fun ~~~

I was suprised when my name was announced in the school assembly... I was selected to be a school prefect under probation.... With this, i will have more responsibilities and i hope i could carried out my duty efficiently.... I would like to congratulate to Khadijah, Atiqah and my other friend who also had been nominated as a prefect next year.Perform the best for our school !!! ~~~ Anyway congratulation to Arsenal because they got their 2004/05 season off to the perfect start by reclaiming the Community Shield from Manchester United with a 3-1 victory in the traditional curtain raiser to the English football season.

It's an unforgettable day on the last Friday when i accidently hurt my good friend. That morning we were having PE lesson and the teacher was not around, so we decided among ourselve to play Softball. We were very happy then. When it was my turn to bat, i didn't notice that there is someone behind me...... i accidently lost my grip with the Sofball Bat... and the bat slip from my grip and hit A's left eyebrow... I was so shocked to see his head bleeding,,owhh my God!! So we quickly carry him to the Surau.... A's hold my arm very tightly because he was very worried at that time.. so my shirt was covered with blood... He wonders whether there will be any stitches involves.... And a few minutes later, our teacher came and took him to the clinic. He came back about an hour later with bandages on his eyebrow and at the same time i feel relief to see him ok... Based on the information that A's told me, he got 4 stitches.... Astonishingly, he was surrounded by the girls in school anxiously to know about his well being.. At the same time, he jokingly ask me.. who is going to take care of his girlfriend if he dies. Anyhow i felt so bad about what happen on that Friday... I pray that he will get well soon.... By the way i like to wish Happy Birthday to Afif..... thank you for the pulut kuning.... Get to go now.... See ya.....

Its been a busy day for me for the pass few days, since my grandma has gone to KL for her treatment, i have to take care my little brother plus the homework and extra activities in school. The 2004/2005 EPL will begin next Saturday and i hope my team ARSENAL will achive better in this season.
